column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Dudes. I don't understand how the system here works. Well... I do now
column2: but it is absolute CHAOS. So
column3: you put your name down on the waitlist with the hostess who will give you an approximate wait time (and you'll wanna double the number they give you
column4: by the way). You'll need to expect a text from them
column5: after which you'll have 5 minutes to check in at the "Text message" section. Now
column6: right after you put your name down on the waitlist
column7: you should get in the other line to pre-order pizza so that it's "ready" for you once you sit down. I'm not really sure how much time this saves you since once we finally sat down at the table
column8: our server said the pizza was still not ready.
